content_chunks.title: Personal Information
content_chunks.content: My name is Tsai Chun Lin. I graduated from Victoria University with a Master of Applied Information Technology. I am passionate about frontend and full-stack development and want to build engaging web applications.

content_chunks.title: Career Objective
content_chunks.content: I aim to obtain a position as a Frontend or Full-Stack Developer to apply my technical skills, creativity, and problem-solving skills to build efficient web applications and contribute to a dynamic team.

content_chunks.title: Education
content_chunks.content: Master of Applied Information Technology, Victoria University (2024-2025), GPA: 6.25. Previously, Master of Information Systems & Advertising, University of Queensland (2021-2023), GPA: 5.37.

content_chunks.title: Work Experience
content_chunks.content: Intern at Ben Cutains (Jan 2025 - Apr 2025) as Technical Support: organized website content and images via WordPress, also did sales tasks. Currently working part-time as a Barista at Kitchen Montague: coffee making and customer service. University project experience includes developing a Book 2 Drive prototype app with 3 team members, designing UI/UX using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL, creating ERD, app workflow, and use case diagrams.

content_chunks.title: Technical Skills
content_chunks.content: Python (5 years), JavaScript (1 year), PHP (6 months), HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, MySQL, Git/GitHub.

content_chunks.title: Projects
content_chunks.content: Book 2 Drive App (2025) - Full-stack web application with user authentication, MySQL integration, responsive design. News Homepage (2024) - Responsive news portal using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap. Multi Steps Form (2024) - Responsive multi-step form with validation and progress indicators.

content_chunks.title: Career Goals
content_chunks.content: Short-term: Obtain a frontend or full-stack developer role. Long-term: Become a senior developer or technical lead. Focus on learning advanced web technologies, UX/UI design, and collaborative development.
